meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Evaluate</kanji> my <kanji>theory</kanji>. Then, when you evaluate, please give me <vocabulary>critique</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>criticism</vocabulary> to help me get better?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
